title: GUY BUTTERY & KANADA NARAHARI | Nāḍī
body:
Salty and humid invocations stretched between South Africa and India in an atmospheric World-Folk crossover album uncovering newfound musical territories



_Featuring Shane Cooper, Thandi Ntuli, Ronan Skillen, Julian Redpath & Chris Letcher_

__



**AVAILABLE ON LP / CD / DD**
